document.full_text: many shops in japan's capital ran out of bottled water on thursday after a warning of radiation danger for babies from a damaged nuclear plant where engineers are battling the world's worst atomic crisis since chernobyl.
document.title: radiation scare leaves tokyo short of bottled water
lines_and_colors: many shops in japan's capital ran out of bottled water on thursday after a warning of radiation danger for babies from a damaged nuclear plant where engineers are battling the world's worst atomic crisis since chernobyl.
